channel.title: [pi]Hitting bug [pi]
channel.description:
Alright im working on a pi...anyways...im using lost legacy as base..,
When you hit too high or sometimes its just random...it will say you hit 0, yet the monster or players hp will go down...any idea on how to fix this so it shows what you hit every time...
